mapper.update:
update train
start_station = #{startStation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
end_station = #{endStation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

t_type = #{tType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where tid = #{tid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
